Title: Requires that certain contracts let by the office of general services be reserved for small businesses, including minority-owned business enterprises and women-owned businesses enterprises
Summary: Requires that certain contracts let by the office of general services be reserved for small businesses, including minority-owned business enterprises and women-owned business enterprises.
LawCode: Amd ยง139-g, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to requiring that certain contracts let by the office of general services be reserved for small businesses, including minority-owned business enterprises and women-owned business enterprises
